Stories from 2017

31 December 2017

31 December 2017

If You Spent 2017 in the Caribbean, This Was The Kind of Year You Had Link: https://globalvoices.org/2017/12/31/if-you-spent-2017-in-the-caribbean-this-was-the-kind-of-year-you-had/

Written by Janine Mendes-Franco Link: https://globalvoices.org/author/janine-mendes-franco/ · Caribbean Link: https://globalvoices.org/-/world/caribbean/

2017 was a bit like a rollercoaster for the Caribbean archipelago, complete with incredible highs and stomach-churning lows.

Massive Protests in Iran as People Weigh in on Its Origins Link: https://globalvoices.org/2017/12/31/massive-protests-in-iran-as-people-across-the-political-weigh-in-on-its-origins/

Written by Mahsa Alimardani Link: https://globalvoices.org/author/mahsa-alimardani/ · Middle East & North Africa Link: https://globalvoices.org/-/world/middle-east-north-africa/

Here is a look at what is happening in Iran, how it differs from 2009's protests, and why there is a lot more to this situation than meets the eye.

2017: Another Year of Feminist Counter-Power in Latin America Link: https://globalvoices.org/2017/12/31/2017-another-year-of-feminist-counter-power-in-latin-america/

Written by Andrea Arzaba Link: https://globalvoices.org/author/andrea-arzaba/ · Latin America Link: https://globalvoices.org/-/world/latin-america/

As women's movements continue to gain ground, 2018 is expected to be a year that sees the growth of many more projects that push for fundamental changes to society.

30 December 2017

Incarceration of Left-wing Japanese Newspaper Editor Sparks Fears of Threat to Free Speech Link: https://globalvoices.org/2017/12/30/incarceration-of-left-wing-japanese-newspaper-editor-sparks-fears-of-threat-to-free-speech/

Written by William Andrews Link: https://globalvoices.org/author/william-andrews/ · East Asia Link: https://globalvoices.org/-/world/east-asia/

"We are very concerned that these types of suppression against citizens by the police will expand. The whole purpose of [conspiracy law] is to repress citizen movement and the press."

Brazil Introduces Tougher Regulations on ‘Fake News’ Ahead of 2018 Elections Link: https://globalvoices.org/2017/12/30/brazil-introduces-tougher-regulations-on-fake-news-ahead-of-2018-elections/
